meanings.definition: A person who murders someone, especially in a treacherous or cowardly manner.
meanings.sent1: The town was terrified of the cutthroats lurking in the shadows.
meanings.sent2: The authorities were on the lookout for the notorious cutthroats responsible for the recent crimes.
meanings.sent3: The play had a comical twist where the cutthroats turned out to be clumsy and inept.
meanings.sent4: In the world of politics, some consider backstabbers to be the cutthroats of the office.
meanings.sent5: The novel vividly portrayed the cutthroats as cunning and ruthless villains.
